message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1400000. It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the market value.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $1200000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need at least $1350000 to make this worthwhile. It's a fair price considering the product's value and what it can bring to your business. Let's find common ground.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1250000 for the product. I think it's a fair compromise considering the value of the product and our previous discussions.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1250000 is still below what I need to make this deal work for me. Let's meet in the middle at $1300000. It's a fair price considering the value of the product and the potential benefits for your business. I'm confident it will be a profitable investment for you.

I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1230000 for the product. I think it's a fair compromise considering the value of the product and our previous discussions.

Bob, we've been going back and forth for a while now, and I'm starting to think we might not be able to reach an agreement.  While I appreciate your persistence, I'm not willing to go any lower than $1280000. This is a significant compromise on my end, and it's a price that still reflects the product's value and potential for your business. Consider it my final offer.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, Alice, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1220000 for the product. I think it's a fair compromise considering the value of the product and our previous discussions.
